alert.note: Alert for Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 23 at 1:10AM MST until January 24 at 9:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 9 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures in the lower 30s expected. * WHERE...Cave Creek/New River, Fountain Hills/East Mesa and Apache Junction/Gold Canyon. * WHEN...From midnight tonight to 9 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Apache Junction, Gold Canyon; Cave Creek, New River; Fountain Hills, East Mesa
